subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets reliever Scott Schoeneweis is not superstitious. He does not believe that his No. 60 has any magical powers. But it reminds him of his past, and he has decided that he cannot toss it away.
snippet: Mets reliever Scott Schoeneweis is not superstitious. He does not believe that his No. 60 has any magical powers. But it reminds him of his past, and he has decided that he cannot toss it away.
